title: Can we sterilize Cats, Dogs, Sheep etc? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: in sram from australia he says can we sterilize cats dogs etc the answer is yes there's no problem in uh sterilizing them so that they won't behave notoriously at a specific period of the month looking for mating and this is permissible because the prophet alice amanda companions had done this to sheep and to other animals as well due to necessity you
